verses.roman:
vividha auddhatya kare śiṣya-gaṇa-saṅge
jahnavite jala-keli kare nana range

synonyms: vividha—various; auddhatya—impudences; kare—does; śiṣya-gaṇa—His disciples; saṅge—with; jāhnavīte—in the water of the Ganges; jala-keli—sporting in the water; kare—does; nānā—in various; raṅge—jokes.
translation: The Lord, as a teacher, performed various kinds of pranks in His sporting pastimes in the water of the Ganges.
